abstract: Fugitive treasure hunter Tommy Thompson is arrested at Florida hotel; fled 2012 arrest warrant and has remained missing since; stands accused of cheating investors out of their share of $50 million in gold from a 19th-century shipwreck.
lead_paragraph: Tommy Thompson has been missing since 2012, when he did not attend a hearing in a lawsuit claiming he had cheated investors out of their share of $50 million in gold bars and coins he had recovered from a 19th-century shipwreck.
snippet: Tommy Thompson has been missing since 2012, when he did not attend a hearing in a lawsuit claiming he had cheated investors out of their share of $50 million in gold bars and coins he had recovered from a 19th-century shipwreck.

headline.main: Florida: Treasure Hunter, Sued by Investors, Is in Custody
headline.print_headline: Florida: Treasure Hunter, Sued by Investors, Is in Custody
